name: MasterPlanner
specialty: Complex task decomposition, planning, and orchestration. Uses NLU, KB context (including topics & feedback), and conversation history to generate multi-step execution plans for other agents.

name: ContentAnalysisAgent
specialty: Analyzes text content from the Knowledge Base to extract keywords and topics. Expects content and returns a JSON with 'keywords' and 'topics'. Can also perform deeper analysis to enrich knowledge base entries.

name: SystemAdmin
specialty: Provides system information (OS, CPU, memory, disk, network, top processes). Accepts descriptive prompts like 'get os info', 'top 5 processes'.

name: ImageForge
specialty: Generates images from text prompts using diffusion models. Manages image saving.

name: WebCrawler
specialty: Scrapes web page content given a URL, optionally summarizes it, and stores results in the Knowledge Base. Also supports general web search queries via external tools (details managed by orchestrator). Handles web research and intelligence.

name: CodeMaster
specialty: Handles code-related tasks: explaining code snippets, generating new code modules/classes, and experimental AI-assisted code modification in projects. Stores outputs in KB. Specialized in Programming & Development.

provided_services.name: validate_code_syntax
provided_services.description: Validates the syntax of a given code snippet for a specified language. Returns validation status and errors if any.

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: The programming language of the snippet.

returns.description: A dictionary with 'is_valid' (boolean) and 'errors' (list of strings, empty if valid).

provided_services.name: generate_docstring
provided_services.description: Generates a docstring for a given code function or class based on its content.

parameters.name: code_snippet
parameters.description: The function or class code for which to generate a docstring.

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: The programming language of the code snippet.

name: AudioMaestro
specialty: Processes audio files: retrieves information, converts formats, and performs text-to-speech (TTS).

name: DocSummarizer
specialty: Summarizes text content, often used internally by other agents like WebCrawler or for document processing tasks.

provided_services.name: summarize_text
provided_services.description: Summarizes a given block of text and returns the summary.

parameters.name: text_to_summarize
parameters.description: The text content that needs to be summarized.

name: GeneralPurposeAgent
specialty: A general-purpose agent for tasks not covered by specialized agents, such as simple Q&A or text generation.

name: NLUAnalysisAgent
specialty: Natural Language Understanding: Performs intent classification against a provided list of candidate intents, and extracts named entities from a given text. Returns results in a structured JSON format.

name: DocProcessor
specialty: Document Analysis & Generation (potentially more comprehensive than summarization)

provided_services.name: process_and_store_document
provided_services.description: Summarizes a given document text, stores the original and summary in the Knowledge Base as a GenericDocument, and returns the KB ID.

parameters.name: document_text
parameters.description: The full text content of the document to process.

parameters.name: source_identifier
parameters.description: An identifier for the document's origin (e.g., filename, URL).

parameters.name: summarization_instructions
parameters.description: Optional instructions for the summarization process (e.g., 'focus on financial aspects', 'provide a short executive summary').

returns.description: A dictionary containing the 'kb_id' of the stored GenericDocument record and a 'message'.

name: VisionAI
specialty: Image & Visual Processing (distinct from ImageForge which is generation-focused)
